fields.question: How do I request time off?
answer: You can request time off via the People Portal under "Time & Attendance".
Your manager will receive a notification to approve or decline your request.

fields.question: Where can I see my benefits and coverage?
answer: Your benefits overview is available in the People Portal under "Benefits".
You can download policy documents and see who to contact for questions.

fields.question: How do I reset my corporate password?
answer: If you still have access to your account, use the "Change password" option in the People Portal profile menu.
If you are locked out, click "Forgot password" on the login page and follow the instructions.
If you’re still stuck, contact the IT Service Desk via the Support page.
